CustomField.formula:
IF( AUM__c = 0.00, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EGJ6", "Redeemed"), IF ( AUM__c > 1, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EGJ4", "In Progress"), IF(ISBLANK( AUM__c ), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EGJ5", "Missing"),
IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EGJ5", "0150b000002EGJ5"))))
CustomField.label: Total Investment Status
